notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: Conception and design of the review: Ezechiel Ngoufack Jagni Semengue, Valantine Ngum Ndze, Maria Mercedes Santoro, Lavinia Fabeni, Francesca Ceccherini Silberstein, Vittorio Colizzi, Carlo Federico Perno, Joseph Fokam. Developed the search strategies: Ezechiel Ngoufack Jagni Semengue, Valantine Ngum Ndze, Alison Wiyeh, Beatrice Dambaya, Georges Teto Desire Takou, Alex Durand Nka, Joseph Fokam. Drafted the manuscript: Ezechiel Ngoufack Jagni Semengue, Valantine Ngum Ndze, Alex Durand Nka, Béatrice Dambaya, Lavinia Fabeni, Joseph Fokam.Involved in critically revising the protocol for important intellectual content: Ezechiel Ngoufack Jagni Semengue, Lavinia Fabeni, Valantine Ngum Ndze, Maria Mercedes Santoro, Joseph Fokam Approved the final version of the submitted manuscript: All the authors
